text: Safra A. Catz (Hebrew: צפרא כץ, born December 1, 1961) is an Israeli-American billionaire banker and technology executive. She is the CEO of Oracle Corporation. In April 2011, she was named co-president and chief financial officer (CFO). ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Israeli businesspeople Category:American billionaires Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States
title: Safra Catz
